overview: 1954. USA. Directed by Weegee. Part of Weegee’s New York.  “Weegee (Arthur Fellig) filmed, Amos Vogel edited. The preciousness of the avant-garde shown at Cinema 16 was interrupted by this breath of fresh air. Weegee’s panorama of the crowd may be the greatest single shot in cinedom.” – Ken Jacobs
title: Weegee's Coney Island
